name: places/ChIJy-bBiX31wokR1QOAPxnRmRk
adrFormatAddress: 4395 Broadway, New York, NY 10040, USA

originalText.text:
My daughter has been attending this daycare for over a year and I feel so lucky to have found such a safe, loving and nurturing environment to care for her. They communicate well, offer healthy meals and plan a variety of stimulating activities- all in a clean inviting space. My daughter loves going and that is an amazing recognition of the fantastic work Bella and her team do.

I could not be happier with them, if you are looking for a daycare- you owe it to yourself to consider Bella Bloom.

text.text:

originalText.text: I can't say enough good things about Bella Bloom Daycare. When we moved to the neighborhood my husband visited several daycares, and after he saw Bella he insisted that we had to send our daughter there. Our experience compared to our old daycare has been night and day for our daughter - she's so happy at Bella Bloom and literally runs to the door every morning with a big smile. Bella has been so caring and attentive - when our daughter was having issues with solids, Bella was extremely patient and gave her lots of extra attention, and even made her foods specifically that she knew she liked at home. The daycare itself is very clean and well-organized, and Bella schedules so many sensory, art, and music activities for the kids. As a working mom it's very hard to have to send my daughter to childcare, but Bella makes it so much easier because I know my daughter is well-cared for and loved. I recommend Bella Bloom without hesitation.

originalText.text: I cannot emphasize enough how amazing this daycare is! Bella is warm, caring and professional. The physical space is thoughtfully arranged and the curriculum is engaging and fun for the kids. Bella is more than a caretaker - she truly loves each of the children like her own. Our oldest son attended Bella Bloom for its inaugural year and has since graduated to 3K. Currently, our second child is attending the daycare and we are delighted to be part of the Bella Bloom family once again! Highly, highly recommend :)

text.text: I cannot emphasize enough how amazing this daycare is! Bella is warm, caring and professional. originalText.text: This daycare is awesome, is bright, very clean and resembles an actual preschool which is why I fell in love with it. Bella is lovely, very friendly, she’s a great teacher that keeps you updated constantly through the day. She has an actual menu she provided me each month which to me was amazing. The small attention to detail she provides is what sets this daycare apart from any other. Trust me when I tell you don’t look anywhere else when it comes to childcare. The adjustment from her daycare to preschool was a breeze for my son thanks to her amazing care. I can’t thank you enough Bella. -Jeff

originalText.text: We've had our daughter at Bella Bloom for over a year and a half, since she was six months old, and she has absolutely flourished in Bella's care! Bella is warm, loving, and gives the kids everything she has to help them thrive. Our daughter walks happily into daycare each morning and gives Bella a huge hug, I think that really says it all. We are thrilled and feel so grateful to have found Bella Bloom and can't recommend it highly enough.
